Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

lifeR 1.0.3

  • Patch to fix bug in DropPattern()’s matching due to regular expression interpretation

lifeR 1.0.2

CRAN release: 2024-05-14

  • Patch to remove error-prone call to curl::curl_fetch_memory

lifeR 1.0.1

CRAN release: 2023-11-24

  • Map tiles provided by OpenStreetMaps, replacing Stadia (formerly Stamen) maps

  • SitesReport() includes parameter include_maps to toggle whether or not maps are created and shown

lifeR 0.9.7

CRAN release: 2023-06-03

  • Documentation now reflects current (>= 2023) eBird data download format

lifeR 0.9.5

  • Initial version release to CRAN
